content: वनं [वन्-अच्] {@--1@} A forest, wood thicket of trees; एको वासः पत्तने वा, वने वा <ls>Bh. 3. 120</ls>; वनेऽपि दोषाः प्रभवंति रागिणाम्. {@--2@} A cluster, group, a quantity of lotuses or other plants growing in a thick bed; चित्रद्विपाः पद्मवनावतीर्णाः <ls>R. 16. 16</ls>, <ls n="R.">6. 86.</ls> {@--3@} A place of abode, residence, house. {@--4@} A fountain, spring (of water). {@--5@} Water in general; <ls>Śi. 6. 73.</ls> {@--6@} A wooden vessel. {@--7@} Wood, timber. {@--8@} Dwelling in a forest, living abroad. {@--9@} <ab>Ved.</ab> A cloud. {@--10@} Light; a ray of light. {@--11@} Worshipping. (As the first member of <ab>comp.</ab> वन may be translated by ‘wild’, ‘forest’; वनवराहः, वनकदली, वनपुष्पं &c.).
